import { useState } from "react"; import "./works.scss"; export default function Works() { const [currentSlide, setCurrentslide] = useState(0); const data = [ { id: "1", title: "C.R.U.D.", desc: "An application I created using, React + Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Material-Ui. ", img:"assets/crud.jpg", }, { id: "2", title: "Social-Neworking", desc: "An application I created using, React + Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Material-Ui. ", img:"assets/social.jpg" }, { id: "3", title: "Login & Registration", desc: "An application I created using, React + Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Material-Ui. ", }, { id: "4", title: "E-Commerce", desc: "An application I created using, React + Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Material-Ui. ", }, ]; const handleClick = (way) =>{ way === "left" ? setCurrentslide(currentSlide > 0 ? currentSlide-1 : 2) : setCurrentslide(currentSlide < data.length -1 ?currentSlide + 1 : 0); } return (
{data.map((d)=>(

{d.title}

{d.desc}

Projects
))}
handleClick("left")}>
handleClick()}>
); }
